bibliographic-data.invention-title: POLYPEPTIDE-K ERHALTEN VON MOMORDICA CHARANTIA UND EINE EXTRAKTIONSMETHODE
POLYPEPTIDE-K OBTAINED FROM MOMORDICA CHARANTIA AND A PROCESS FOR THE EXTRACTION THEREOF
EXTRACTION DE PROTEINE/POLYPEPTIDE-K A PARTIR DE MOMORDICA CHARANTIA ET PROCESSUS D'EXTRACTION CORRESPONDANT

abstract.p: The invention relates to a highly effective hypoglycaemic polyeptide-k, extracted from i(Momordica charantia). This invention also provides a method for the extraction of said polypeptide-k from i(Momordica charantia). Further, the invention provides novel hypoglycaemic compositions employing the said extract, and useful in the treatment of diabetes mellitus.
